scripts.build: npm run debug-prisma && next build && npm run copy-prisma-engine
scripts.debug-prisma: echo '=== DEBUGGING PRISMA SETUP ===' && echo 'Node version:' && node --version && echo 'Platform:' && node -e "console.log(process.platform, process.arch)" && echo 'Environment:' && env | grep -E '(VERCEL|NODE_ENV|PRISMA)' || true && echo 'Setting PRISMA_CLI_BINARY_TARGETS...' && export PRISMA_CLI_BINARY_TARGETS='rhel-openssl-3.0.x' && echo 'Searching for Prisma engines...' && find . -name '*query_engine*' -o -name 'libquery_engine*' 2>/dev/null || echo 'No Prisma engines found' && echo 'Searching in @shophost/rest-api...' && find node_modules/@shophost -name '*prisma*' -o -name '*query_engine*' -o -name 'libquery_engine*' 2>/dev/null || echo 'No engines in @shophost' && echo 'Checking pnpm structure...' && ls -la node_modules/.pnpm/ | grep -E '(shophost|prisma)' || echo 'No pnpm structure found' && echo 'Checking @shophost/rest-api package structure...' && ls -la node_modules/@shophost/rest-api/ || echo 'No @shophost/rest-api found' && echo '=== END DEBUGGING ==='
scripts.copy-prisma-engine: echo '=== COPYING PRISMA ENGINE ===' && mkdir -p .next/server && echo 'Created .next/server directory' && echo 'Searching for rhel-openssl-3.0.x engine...' && find . -name 'libquery_engine-rhel-openssl-3.0.x.so.node' -exec echo 'Found engine at: {}' \; -exec cp {} .next/server/ \; 2>/dev/null || echo 'No rhel-openssl-3.0.x engine found' && echo 'Searching for any query engine...' && find . -name 'libquery_engine*.so.node' -exec echo 'Found engine: {}' \; -exec cp {} .next/server/ \; 2>/dev/null || echo 'No query engines found' && echo 'Final .next/server contents:' && ls -la .next/server/ || echo 'No .next/server directory' && echo '=== END COPYING ==='
scripts.debug-postinstall: echo '=== POST-INSTALL DEBUGGING ===' && echo 'Checking if @shophost/rest-api has postinstall...' && cd node_modules/@shophost/rest-api && npm run postinstall 2>/dev/null || echo 'No postinstall script in @shophost/rest-api' && cd ../../../ && echo 'Post-install engine search:' && find . -name '*query_engine*' -o -name 'libquery_engine*' 2>/dev/null || echo 'No engines found after postinstall' && echo '=== END POST-INSTALL DEBUGGING ==='
